name: Basecamp
description: Integrate with Basecamp to list, list, create and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Projects
tools.description: List all projects in the Basecamp account. Returns project names, descriptions, and status.

tools.name: List Todos
tools.description: List to-dos in a Basecamp to-do list. Returns to-do titles, assignees, and completion status.

tools.name: Create Todo
tools.description: Create a new to-do in a Basecamp to-do list. Specify content, assignees, and optional due date.

tools.name: List Messages
tools.description: List messages (posts) in a Basecamp project message board. Returns titles, authors, and dates.

tools.name: Create Message
tools.description: Create a new message (post) on a Basecamp project message board.

accountId.label: Account ID
accountId.description: Your Basecamp account ID (found in your Basecamp URL)
